NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: The Mane Choice Pink Lemonade & Coconut Curl Boosting Sherbet
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Pink Lemonade & Coconut Curl Boosting Sherbet is a lightweight styling cream that boosts curl definition and tames frizz. It boosts curl definition & fights frizz, it's great for wash-and-gos, twist-outs, & braid-outs, and it conditions, protects, and makes hair feel soft

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Jamaican Mango and Lime Black Castor Oil
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Moisturize, rejuvenate and soften your hair with this Jamaican Mango and Lime Black Castor Oil. NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Palmer's Cocoa Butter + Biotin Length Retention Deep Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Palmer’s Cocoa Butter Formula® Length Retention system with Biotin, fully strengthens hair with powerhouse natural protectants that help block fragileness, brittleness, breakage and split ends, to help hair achieve its optimal length. NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Emerge Your Mane Bestie Leave-In Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Emerge's "My Mane BFF" leave-in conditioner is a hair conditioner made with Pequi Oil and fair trade Shea Butter to hydrate frizzy curls; this daily conditioner brings rich moisture and slip. Made with Pequi Oil, this Emerge conditioner for curly and frizz-prone hair can be used as a daily conditioner for frizz-free curls every day. It's a perfect conditioner for curls on the go.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: TPH by TARAJI Master Cleanse Scalp Treatment Wash
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Master Cleanse is our secret sauce, finally perfected and ready for you! This tingling, refreshing, and rebalancing formula helps dissolve scalp build-up providing a clean, balanced environment for healthier, natural hair. Whether you're wearing protective styles (like weaves & braids) or going au naturel, our exclusive tri-touch applicator deep dives to the areas you can't get to with just your fingertips.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Design Essentials Almond Avocado Leave In Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Our Almond & Avocado Detangling Leave-In Conditioner delivers lightweight moisturizing that instantly replenishes your strands with nutrients lost through everyday styling routines, weather, and environmental factors. This nourishing formula penetrates strands quickly to soften and smooth the cuticle for easy detangling and the ultimate frizz control.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Bounce is a one & done styling cream that can be used alone to achieve the perfect balance of bouncy, defined, shiny, and hydrated hairstyles such as wash and go’s, twist-outs, braid-outs, or any style where you are looking for amazing definition without the crunch! No need to pair a leave-in conditioner with this product.
TGIN's Twist and Define Cream is derived from coconut oil and vitamin E, creating smooth and shiny twist outs that feature long-lasting definition.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Creamy, luxurious & boosted with a blend of glorious oils, PATTERN's Hydration Shampoo helps curls & coils dance in a wash of liquid sunshine. This gentle, moisturizing formula softly lathers to cleanse your hair & scalp removing build-up & dirt without stripping away moisture.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Carol's Daughter Coco Crème Curl Quenching Shampoo with Coconut Oil for Very Dry Hair
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Let your hair soak up this creamy moisturizing Coco Creme Shampoo that is blended with our Coco Creme recipe, including Coconut Oil, Coconut Milk, Murumuru Butter and Mango Butter. The deeply moisturizing Coco Creme system, including our conditioner and velvet cream hair mask, softens while it cleanses, giving extra dry hair an extreme moisture experience—one that you can truly feel and see.

The world of temporary hair color will never be the same! Formulated specifically for natural hair, Curls Unleashed Color Blast elongates and defines curls with beautiful, show-stopping color and no damage. NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Weightless Healing Dry Oil Lightweight Hair Oil Mist - 4 fl oz
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Mend split ends and eliminate frizz with OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Weightless Healing Dry Oil Spray. Ideal for all hair textures, moisture levels and types, the hair-smoothing oil mist helps tame flyaways. Formulated with a hydrating blend of rich cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil, it helps leave hair feeling smooth, soft and shiny. Lightweight hair mist also helps to penetrate the hair shaft for hair that looks and feels absolutely radiant. Plus, the citrus-fresh, floral-green and woody scent makes curly hair care an all-around sensory experience and leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this anti-frizz dry oil is gentle on hair while helping improve strength and elasticity. For a full hair care routine that'll leave hair lush, soft and divinely shiny, pair with Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo and Conditioner and other OGX Moroccan oil hair products.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Target, Walmart, Sally Beauty, Amazon, BJ's Warehouse
